import React from"react";import styles from'./DebateProfile.module.css';import rfkvshotez from'../imgs/rfkvshotez.jpeg';import{ParticipantId}from"./Participant";import*as uuid from'uuid';import hotez from'../imgs/hotez.jpeg';import RFK from'../imgs/RFK.jpeg';import JR from'../imgs/JR.jpeg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const DebateProfile=()=>{const dummyParticipants={participants:[{name:'RFK',id:ParticipantId.of(uuid.v4()),role:'participant',imgRoute:RFK},{name:'Hotez',id:ParticipantId.of(uuid.v4()),role:'moderator',imgRoute:hotez},{name:'Joe Rogan',id:ParticipantId.of(uuid.v4()),role:'moderator',imgRoute:JR}]};// static for now
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.debateProfile,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:styles.debateProfileImg,src:rfkvshotez}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.debateProfileHeader,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:styles.debateSectionTitle,children:'RFK vs Hotez'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.debateSectionSummary,children:'Debate on the safety and efficacy of vaccines'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.buttons,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.shareButton,children:"Share"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.pledgeButton,children:"$1.2mil Pledged"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"solid"}),DebateParticipants(dummyParticipants)]});};export const DebateParticipants=_ref=>{let{participants}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.participantSection,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Participants"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.debateParticipants,children:participants.map(participant=>DebateParticipant(participant))})]});};export const DebateParticipant=participant=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:styles.participantImg,src:participant.imgRoute}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:styles.centeredText,children:participant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.centeredText,children:participant.role})]});};
